exchange.question: What happened here?
exchange.answer: I've finally got my exhibition here for all to see!

exchange.question: Did you make all this mess?
exchange.answer: Mess? I've made this place better!

exchange.question: Who painted all these paintings?
exchange.answer: The only one worth looking at is this one I painted here!

character.statement: There's nothing else here worth seeing but my masterpiece!
You're just like all the rest! But you won't ignore my genius!
I won't let you destroy my work!
I've already got the Turpentine ready.
Maybe I should talk to the Black Widow first...
These paintings have all been vandalized. They need to be cleaned up.
